summary: Send Refund job to connected terminal
title: startRefundJob(amount:transactionUUID:adminPin:enableEditableRefundAmountUi:enableReceiptUi:enableReversal:finishTimeOut:dismissible:)
rawIndexableTextContent: Send Refund job to connected terminal  total refund amount as integer. transaction uuid for an x-purchase transaction to be refunded. 4 digits admin pin for refund. enable the terminal to adjust refund amount by showing amount editing UI. should terminal show receipt interface when job ended with result. is this transaction reversable. max time in seconds for job to be excecuted by terminal. eenable the terminal user to cancel a transaction by swiping the transaction UI down or taking any other available action to cancel. Discussion Refund job is rquesting terminal for fully or partialy refund of x-purchase job using same consumer payment card used for the purchase. while amount is integer type, the terminal will consider last 2 digits as currency precision (HALALH) e.g 200 => 2.00, 3094 => 30.94. you should implement RefundResult delegate to your class to receive results and receipts from terminal see sessionJob(didReceiveResultForRefund:forJob:)

Send Reversal  Job  to connected terminal
title: startReversalJob(transactionUUID:enableReceiptUi:finishTimeOut:dismissible:)
rawIndexableTextContent: Send Reversal  Job  to connected terminal  transaction uuid for an x-purchase or x-refund job to be reverse. should terminal show receipt user interface after transaction is ended. max time in seconds for job to be excecuted by terminal. eenable the terminal user to cancel a transaction by swiping the transaction UI down or taking any other available action to cancel. Discussion Reversal job is requesting reversal for previous transaction amount for givin transaction UUID you should implement ReversalResult delegate to your class to receive results and receipts from terminal see sessionJob(didReceiveResultForReversal:forJob:)

summary: Send Reconciliation Job  to connected terminal
title: startReconcileJob(adminPin:enableReceiptUi:finishTimeOut:dismissible:)
rawIndexableTextContent: Send Reconciliation Job  to connected terminal  4 digits admin pin for reconciliation operation. should terminal show receipt user interface after transaction is ended. max time in seconds for job to be excecuted by terminal. eenable the terminal user to cancel a transaction by swiping the transaction UI down or taking any other available action to cancel. Discussion Reconciliation job is requesting reconcile for previous un reconciled transactions. you should implement ReversalResult delegate to your class to receive results and receipts from terminal see sessionJob(didReceiveResultForReconciliation:forJob:)

title: connectivityConnect(didCloseFor:)
summary: Terminal is disconnected and connection is in close state
Send Purchase job with provided transaction UUID to connected terminal
title: startPurchaseJob(jobUUID:amount:enableReceiptUi:enableReversal:finishTimeOut:dismissible:)
rawIndexableTextContent: Send Purchase job with provided transaction UUID to connected terminal  unique identfier  to be used later for result inquery in case not delivered. total purchase amount as integer. should terminal show receipt interface when job ended with result. is this transaction reversable. max time in seconds for job to be excecuted by the terminal. eenable the terminal user to cancel a transaction by swiping the transaction UI down or taking any other available action to cancel. Discussion Purchase Job is requesting terminal  to present payment request to the consumer and send result back. making purchase job with provided uuid make it easy for developer to store generated uuid and can recall startPurchaseJob with same UUID for inquery undelivered result by android terminal. while amount is integer type, the terminal will consider last 2 digits as currency precision (HALALH) e.g 200 => 2.00, 3094 => 30.94. you should implement PurchaseResult delegate to your class to receive results and receipts from terminal see sessionJob(didReceiveResultForPurchase:forJob:) you should save transaction_uuid   in case you need for future Refund or Reversal transaction.

summary: Connect and pair Nearpay terminal then start sending Jobs and get results
title: Connectivity
rawIndexableTextContent: Connect and pair Nearpay terminal then start sending Jobs and get results  Overview Connectivty is singleton class helps connect and pair Nearpay terminal and persist a profile for success connection as pair profile. and will auto load saved profile to retrieve connectivty for last paired device.

summary: Send Purchase job to connected terminal
title: startPurchaseJob(amount:enableReceiptUi:enableReversal:finishTimeOut:dismissible:)
rawIndexableTextContent: Send Purchase job to connected terminal  total purchase amount as integer. should terminal show receipt interface when job ended with result. is this transaction reversable. max time in seconds for job to be excecuted by the terminal. eenable the terminal user to cancel a transaction by swiping the transaction UI down or taking any other available action to cancel. Discussion Purchase Job is requesting terminal  to present payment request to the consumer and send result back. while amount is integer type, the terminal will consider last 2 digits as currency precision (HALALH) e.g 200 => 2.00, 3094 => 30.94. you should implement PurchaseResult delegate to your class to receive results and receipts from terminal see sessionJob(didReceiveResultForPurchase:forJob:) you should save transaction_uuid   in case you need for future Refund or Reversal transaction.

NearPary Connect IOS SDK for wireless integration with Nearpay Softpos termainls. Overview NearPary Connect IOS SDK helps our client to wireless connect,pair,integrate their POS/Cashier IOS soulutins with Nearpay android Softpos termainls in order to remotly execute transactions on connected terminals Supported Connectivity Ethernet (TCP/IP) Bluetooth Supported Transactions Purchase Refund Reversal Reconcile
title: NearpayConnectCore
summary: NearPary Connect IOS SDK for wireless integration with Nearpay Softpos termainls.
